newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Ayala Corp B shares down 5.45 pct on foreign sales.
newsitem.headline: Ayala Corp B shares down 5.45 pct on foreign sales.

text.p: Ayala Corp B shares dropped 1.50 pesos, or 5.45 percent, to 26 pesos on Wednesday in Manila due to foreign selling, brokers said.
"Foreign fund managers are unloading their B shares and Ayala Corp is part of the selldown," said Teresa Lee, trader at Lippo Securities.
Brokers said there was no significant company news to pull down Ayala Corp's shares.
"It's part of the portfolio realignment of foreigners who are seeing markets outside Asia as more attractive," said Julie Villena, trader at Dharmala Securities (Philippines) Inc.
